welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dearborn, where the rich history of the Ford Motor Company meets the charm of a vibrant, diverse community. As you explore our city, take in the renowned Henry Ford Museum and immerse yourself in our welcoming neighborhoods and delicious cuisine. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.description: LaPita is a middle eastern restaurant located in Dearborn.
restaurants.address: 22681 Newman St (at Haigh St.), Dearborn, MI 48124
